name: Bleed
desc: Deal 1 damage per second, Negate all healing received

name: Rage
desc: Increase damage dealt by 10% (+5% * level) and movement speed by 2% (+2% * level)

name: Antidote
desc: Remove all negative effects over time

name: Lethal Poison
desc: Deadly version of poison, can kill even having 1% below health

name: Wings
desc: Allow to fly and ignore fall damage

name: Frostbite
desc: Deal 1 damage per seconds and stop entity's movements

name: Thorns
desc: Reflect (25% damage dealt * level) to attacker

name: Curse Flame
desc: Burn entity dealing (1% max health * level) damage per second, can't extinguish by water

name: Fear
desc: Distorted the entity's movements and if player they cant able to sleep and darken the screen

name: Iron Skin
desc: Increase Armor and Armor Toughness by 15% per level

name: Immunity
desc: Ignore incoming damage, after ignoring the effect will depleted

name: Recovery
desc: Restore 1% max health, considered as the upgraded version of Regeneration Effect

name: Paralyze
desc: Disable entity's movement and if player they cant use any items

name: Leech
desc: Gain 5% * level Life Steal

name: Hunger Boost
desc:
Gain Two States: Hunting State and Killer Instinct State

- Hunting State: Allow to see entity with 16x16

- Killer Instinct: When target health are less than user's health it gave Vulnerable 1 effect for whole duration

name: Vulnerable
desc: Increase damage taken by 10% * level

name: Healing Sickness
desc: Unable to heal using any healing potion item

name: Stun
desc: Disable entity's movement and unable to use, attack and mine

name: Lightning
desc: After slight delay summon lightning bolt dealing 4 + (1 * per level) within 1 * level range

name: Armor Break
desc: Reduce Armor and Armor Toughness by 15% per level

name: Dragon Flame
desc: Burn dealing 1 damage per seconds, Water cant extinguish and deal additional 2 damage per seconds

name: Nature Heal
desc: Increase Health Regeneration by 15% per level
